localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Nuxt 3 is finally out in beta. Based on Vue 3, Vite and Nitro to create modern web applications that can be deployed anywhere, including Vercel, Netlify and CloudFlare Workers. Nuxt is an open source framework under MIT license.
nodes.title: Nuxt 3 Beta - The Hybrid Vue(3) Framework
nodes.author: SÃ©bastien Chopin

nodes.excerpt: cocoNFT makes it easy for all creators to get paid for their work. Start selling your Instagram posts as NFTs all without upfront fees. Absolutely no previous experience with crypto is needed. Takes just 3 minutes to get started.
nodes.title: cocoNFT - Sell your Instagram posts as NFTs
nodes.author: Reid Robinson

nodes.excerpt: Heron data makes it 100x easier for Fintechs to build features on top of bank and card transactions. Integrate our simple API and focus on your customers
nodes.title: Heron Data - Better transaction data for fintechs serving SMBs
nodes.author: Jamie Parker

nodes.excerpt: Every weekday Noah Brier & Colin Nagy (and friends) send an email about something interesting. We try to keep things under 800 words and be explicit on just why the topic is interesting.
nodes.title: Why is this interesting? - A daily newsletter for the intellectually omnivorous.
nodes.author: Noah Brier

nodes.excerpt: Call your prospects at the right time, no matter where you are. Use your cell phone to reach out, follow up and stay connected. Try Woodpecker Calls to get closer to your ideal customers.
nodes.title: Woodpecker Calls - Leads in your pocket to schedule & track sales calls
nodes.author: Matt Tarczynski

nodes.excerpt: Use Mercuryâ€™s Investor Database to find the most active seed and pre-seed investors, filterable by industry, type, and check size.
nodes.title: Investor Database from Mercury - Find top seed investors and get the info you need to raise
nodes.author: immad

nodes.excerpt: Create your profile page on Linkyy, place all your links in one place, and share your page with others in no time!
nodes.title: Linkyy - A simple, yet cool place for all your links
nodes.author: Csaba Kissi

nodes.excerpt: Paragon is the easiest way to ship embedded, customer-facing integrations between your product and third-party SaaS apps. With our new Custom Integration Builder, you can now build integrations with any SaaS app in minutes - as long as it has a public API.
nodes.title: Paragon Custom Integration Builder - Embed any integration in your SaaS product 10x faster
nodes.author: Brandon Foo

nodes.excerpt: Clash is a space to connect with your ride-or-dies. SHOOT VIDEOS: Everyone is a Creator on Clash so flex your creativity. SEND DROPS: Show your support. Send it - itâ€™s that easy. LEVEL UP: Join a thread. Show some love. Send Fan Mail. Shoot videos. Send drops.
nodes.title: Clash App - Shoot videos and send drops
nodes.author: Alexis Ohanian

nodes.excerpt: A FREE online editor that helps you manage translations in PO files for your mulitlingual software projects. Useful for makers that work with Wordpress, Python, Django, Flask, PHP, Symfony, Elixir...
nodes.title: PO File Editor - Free editor for translations in portable object files
nodes.author: Goran Luledzija

nodes.excerpt: Open Makers is a community for those of you who are "building in public" and want to share your maker journey. Share important product milestones, metrics, articles and so much more...
nodes.title: Open Makers - Community of makers who build in public
nodes.author: Micah Iverson

nodes.excerpt: Interakt enables small & medium businesses to manage customer interactions, facilitate sales and customer support on WhatsApp. Powered by official WhatsApp Business APIs, Interakt provides a shared Inbox, campaign manager, Shopify integration & more.
nodes.title: Interakt - Grow your business faster on WhatsApp Business
nodes.author: Aakrit A Vaish

nodes.excerpt: FindNiche provides Aliexpress & Shopify store search, ad spy, and product analysis to help Shopify & Aliexpress sellers find winning products easy.
nodes.title: FindNiche - Discover winning products and niches for e-commerce sellers
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: How do you get smart training without a professional coach? You can easily do it with our mobile app! It combines computer vision, the expertise of trainers, rehabilitation specialists, and, most important â€“ a world-class athlete's experience. Time to train!
nodes.title: Professional Weightlifting - Training & nutrition app for un-professional weightlifters
nodes.author: Dmitry Titov

nodes.excerpt: Spiti is your internal video knowledge base and library. Except, access to any video is super easy. We help you store, organize, and easily access all your team's internal video content.
nodes.title: Spiti - A simple, private, and internal YouTube for teams
nodes.author: Sanket Saurav

nodes.excerpt: Apply to millions of jobs on the web in 1-click with our browser extension. Discover positions that uniquely fit your interests & background, and track your outgoing applications using our website. Spend time preparing for the interview, not applying to jobs.
nodes.title: Simplify - Autofill job applications and apply anywhere in one click
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Vimcal is the worldâ€™s fastest calendar, beautifully designed for people who work remotely and live in their calendars. It comes fully-featured with timezone conversion, booking links, keyboard shortcuts, and everything else a modern calendar app should have.
nodes.title: Vimcal - Superhuman for Calendar
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Xano is the fastest way to build a scalable backend for your App using No Code. Each Xano account comes with a scalable server, a flexible database, and a No Code API builder that can transform, filter, and integrate with data from anywhere.
nodes.title: Xano - The fastest way to build and deploy a scalable backend
nodes.author: KP

nodes.excerpt: Defi Llama is a dashboard that provides cross-chain data on the state of Decentralized Finance. They're committed to accuracy and transparency. I've found it really useful for exploring new ecosystems!
nodes.title: DefiLlama - Defi Dashboard
nodes.author: Jonah Erlich

nodes.excerpt: Find similar YouTube channels, discover new channels based on your interests, create your own YouTube collections with your favorite channels. Contribute and help other community members to find channels they are looking for.
nodes.title: SimilarChannels - Find similar YouTube channels easily
nodes.author: Bohdan

nodes.excerpt: Typli.AI is the most intuitive A.I Content tool which combines AI Writing and an SEO Assistant that can help you save time and write smarter. Typli.ai can understand your instructions, simply use our +100 writing commands and let the magic happen!
nodes.title: Typli.AI - The intuitive AI Writing tool which combines AI and SEO
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Too shy for TikTok? Canâ€™t get into Clubhouse? Want to cheer up a friend? Forgot your grannyâ€™s bday? With our tool you can Record and add a sound from our library. They stack up vertically so the sounds are easy to see & move. Laughter guaranteed!
nodes.title: Loops Audio - Fun short easy audio messages
nodes.author: Lianne Bergeron

nodes.excerpt: The most sustainable Fairphone yet, now with 5G speed, 5-year warranty and electronic waste neutral. You donâ€™t need to be an expert to swap out the battery or display. No part of Fairphone 4 is glued shut, so you can choose to easily repair it yourself.
nodes.title: Fairphone 4 - A sustainable, modular phone built to last
nodes.author: Calum Webb

nodes.excerpt: mixmello is a free, open source tool to create remixed versions of your favourite playlists. Search for the Spotify playlist you want to remix, tailor the remixes to your liking (with song previews), then save the playlist with a single click.
nodes.title: mixmello - Create remixed versions of your favourite Spotify playlists
nodes.author: Alex Gurr

nodes.excerpt: codeStarter is the fastest way to go from project idea to code for your web apps! Simply enter your idea and preferred development stacks, and we'll generate the necessary files for your project with GPT-3.
nodes.title: codeStarter - Build web apps with natural language!
nodes.author: Sidd Rao

nodes.excerpt: Plans makes it easy to expand your social life and keep track of it using a streamlined event calendar. Use the app to plan fun activities, meet new people, meet friends, and make meaningful experiences in real life. Plans is the event organizer for everyone!
nodes.title: Plans - The ultimate social event planner app for real-life meetups!
nodes.author: Adnan Kharuf

nodes.excerpt: Promoted unifies organic search, promotions, and ads in one optimized system for marketplaces. We sort your marketplace search and promote the best listings at the top to increase revenue. http://promoted.ai
nodes.title: Promoted.ai - Search and feed ranking for marketplaces
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Backstage lets CH creators record their rooms & gives them a place to share for replay. Recordings shared on BS include a transcript, making it the first place for the Deaf and HoH community to have easy access to the knowledge shared in CH rooms.
nodes.title: Backstage for Clubhouse - Record & Replay your CH rooms
nodes.author: baileydrake

nodes.excerpt: Form new habits, follow existing ones. Find time for them in your tight schedule. Log emotions, feelings and thoughts. Track progress and don't forget your everyday duties and deadlines. We build tee to make your dai- ly routine something unique and exciting!
nodes.title: Next - Daily routine & goals planner
nodes.author: Tomasz K.

nodes.excerpt: Browser based annotation tool. Free and easy to markup images. Upload any images or take screenshot of your screen. Without any accounts. Just annotate!
nodes.title: Annotate Screen - Markup your image or screenshot of your screen
nodes.author: Sergey Koshelnikov

nodes.excerpt: CreatorScout is a platform to find Twitter users who share your interests. Discover underrated content creators, match 1:1 to make new friends, grow your audience, and much more.
nodes.title: CreatorScout - Discover Twitter accounts to follow and promote your own
nodes.author: Alyssa X

nodes.excerpt: Writing meta descriptions is not fun. Use our fine tuned GPT-3 model to do it for you.
nodes.title: Meta Description Generator - Let GPT-3 write meta descriptions for your web pages
nodes.author: Thomas Petracco

nodes.excerpt: AskOverflow let you ask questions to StackOverflow without leaving your editor.
nodes.title: AskOverflow - Ask questions to StackOverflow directly from inside VS Code
nodes.author: Fabio Sabbion

nodes.excerpt: Structured is a visual day planner, which combines calendars and to-do lists into an easy-to-use interface. You can schedule tasks with a few taps, see their progress throughout the day and tick them off once you are done.
nodes.title: Structured 2.0 - A simple and beautifully visual day planner for iOS
nodes.author: Leo Mehlig

nodes.excerpt: Researching startup used to take forever. Now, everything's in one place. All backed by top investors like Sequoia, A16Z and YC. Searchable and filterable. Updates daily.
nodes.title: Top Startups - Database of top startups and jobs, backed by top VCs
nodes.author: Linda Zhang

nodes.excerpt: TinyFunction allows you to write and deploy cloud functions (~ AWS Lambda's) instantly. Visit TinyFunction.com, write function code and click Deploy button, thats it.
nodes.title: TinyFunction - World's fastest way to create cloud functions
nodes.author: Kishore

nodes.excerpt: 10,000 NFTs collection, combined famous paintings with CryptoPunks made by AI (neural networks)
nodes.title: Artpunks - NFTs by Picasso, Michelangelo, and many more
nodes.author: Robin

nodes.excerpt: Feedbee lets you collect issues, ideas, and feedback on your website effortlessly. All you need to do is add our code snippet to your landing page.
nodes.title: Feedbee - Collect user feedback on your website, effortlessly
nodes.author: Jason Wong

nodes.excerpt: Coin Sets are theme-based bundles of cryptocurrencies actively managed by experts. They help you diversify your investments across a theme and minimize your risk. Invest in ideas you believe in and grow your wealth in the long run!
nodes.title: Mudrex Coin Sets - Invest in theme-based bundles of cryptocurrencies
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: BlogToNFT is for all the writers/bloggers who wish to create their own NFT. At BlogToNFT a blogger/writer will have to prove their ownership and after adding details they can easily publish NFT straightaway into the Blockchain which is also visible on opensea
nodes.title: BlogToNFT - Autograph and sell your blog as NFT on Opensea
nodes.author: kartik puri

nodes.excerpt: Grafix Image Editor is a completely free online photo editor designed for individuals or businesses who want a quick and easy basic features for their designs.
nodes.title: Grafix - A free online image editor - No registrations required
nodes.author: S.Adrian Krokodil

nodes.excerpt: Research tool for Youtube content creators. Unlock keywords or tags that your competitors are using this simple free tool. Simply install this extension using the "Add to Chrome" button and start unlocking the keywords/tags.
nodes.title: Tube Spy - Discover the keywords that your YouTube competitors use
nodes.author: Monzurul Hasan

nodes.excerpt: collected is a web design showcase which shows only eight sites, shuffled on every visit. Unlike other showcases, you will find new sites all the time instead of being limited to the recent entries. New sites are added to the stack every day.
nodes.title: collected - New web design inspiration on every visit
nodes.author: Jonas Pelzer

nodes.excerpt: Bring color to your designs using these cheerful illustrations. Downtown pack contains 200 fully editable vector illustrations ready to use in your website or app design. ğŸ”¥ Part of our 8000+ illustrations bundle + Free updates
nodes.title: Downtown illustrations - Creative illustrations for your next project
nodes.author: Ramy Wafaa

nodes.excerpt: Nowadays, creators have no control of their fanbase, their earnings & their brands. We empower creators to build their own fan platform, take back control of their fanbase, increase fan engagement, and make more money from their passion.
nodes.title: Fangage 2.0 - Your fans, your platform
nodes.author: Janis Mjartans

nodes.excerpt: Warp your designs using Smudge, Twirl, Bulge, Pinch, Arc and Free Transform tools. This plugin brings the typical warp tools known from other vector apps to Figma.
nodes.title: Warp Tools - Smudge, twirl, pinch, arc and free transform tools for Figma
nodes.author: Petter Nilsson

nodes.excerpt: Speakezee allows you to create and share voice stories that expire every 7 days. Our mission at Speakezee is to give people a fast, fun, and engaging way to share their stories, ideas, and emotions through voice!
nodes.title: Speakezee - Create and share voice stories that expire every 7 days!
nodes.author: Gleb Braverman

nodes.excerpt: Data that you create and is relevant to you is present on various applications like Google Drive or Slack but is inaccessible to public search engines. LetsFind integrates with many such applications to help you find your content quickly from one single page.
nodes.title: LetsFind - Search engine for your personal data
nodes.author: Rohith PR

nodes.excerpt: This is the only free way to search Amazon's Best Sellers. Plus you can add it to your website and earn commissions too.
nodes.title: Search Best Sellers - Search Amazon's most-ordered products
nodes.author: Michael Diaz
